an3.118:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti …pe… samphappalāpī hoti.
an3.118:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abhijjhālu hoti byāpannacitto.
an3.118:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti viparītadassano:
an3.118:4.3: ‘natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ …pe… ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
an3.118:4.5: Sīlavipattihetu vā, bhikkhave …pe… diṭṭhivipattihetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
an3.118:4.6: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, apaṇṇako maṇi uddhaṃ khitto yena yeneva patiṭṭhāti suppatiṭṭhitaṃyeva patiṭṭhāti;
an3.118:4.7: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sīlavipattihetu vā sattā …pe… upapajjanti.
an3.118:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe…
an3.118:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anabhijjhālu hoti abyāpannacitto.
an3.118:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti aviparītadassano:
an3.118:8.3: ‘atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ …pe… ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
an3.118:8.5: Sīlasampadāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti. Cittasampadāhetu vā …pe… diṭṭhisampadāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
an3.118:8.6: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, apaṇṇako maṇi uddhaṃ khitto yena yeneva patiṭṭhāti suppatiṭṭhitaṃyeva patiṭṭhāti;
an3.118:8.7: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sīlasampadāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti, cittasampadāhetu vā sattā …pe… diṭṭhisampadāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
